scene: Never be able to wear socks and shoes ever again
Hear all voices & sounds at an annoying nails-on-chalkboard high pitch
Hit your foot on the metal part of the bed
Intentionally break a glass bottle on your own head not covered by insurance
Bare knuckle fight a pissed off Mike Tyson in his prime
Be 1/100 humans to survive a major catestrophic event
Get kicked in the genitalia everytime you use a noun
Rip out all of your hair & every finger & toe nail
Bad toothache when ever you sit still
Not able remember anything new from this point on & have your memory reset every 6 hours
Jam a tooth pick into your big toe nail & kick the wall as hard as you can
